description: Explore how Elon Musk utilizes open source licensing as a catalyst for innovation across industries like transportation and technology. The article highlights Musk's pivotal strategies with Tesla, SpaceX, and more, emphasizing collaboration, transparency, and industry advancement.
keywords: Elon Musk, open source licensing, innovation, Tesla, SpaceX, transportation, technology, collaboration, patents, sustainability, community, software
title: Elon Musk and Open Source Licensing: A Catalyst for Innovation
